pullRequest.title: feat!: remove session pool preparing
pullRequest.bodyText: Removes the feature for preparing sessions in the session pool. This is step 2 of inlining BeginTransaction with the first statement of a transaction.

commit.message: test: fix malformed retry loop in test case

nodes.bodyText: nit: could we rename methods such as getReadSession() to getSession() now that we do not have such separation?
nit: could we add javadocs on the deprecation notice?
Could we remove the branching here, since useInlinedBegin is always true?
